alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Mason; McLean; Peoria; Schuyler; Tazewell; Woodford (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:52AM CST until January 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central and west central Illinois. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain snow mix early Friday morning, then switches to snow by mid afternoon Friday as colder air and strong winds move in. Near blizzard-like conditions are possible Friday afternoon into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the Internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com

area.areaDesc: Fulton; Mason; McLean; Peoria; Schuyler; Tazewell; Woodford
